title: Samsung debuts sustainably sourced Galaxy S21 cases and Galaxy Watch 4 bands for Earth Day
content:
As Earth Day approaches, Samsung has debuted a new batch of accessories that are sustainably developed with Sean Wotherspoon for the Galaxy S21 and Galaxy Watch 4.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung debuts sustainably sourced Galaxy S21 cases and Galaxy Watch 4 bands for Earth Day appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has announced a collection of sustainable smartphone cases and watch bands for its Galaxy S21 and Galaxy Watch 4 for Earth Day 2022.
